mapper.sql: t_id, Appid, Busdate, Organ, Depart, Provider, Code, Barcode, Acceptid, Amount, Sum_Cost, Sum_Price, ND, Moditime, nature, sum_disc, Sort, statue
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from temporary_sale
order by ${orderByClause}
